info.title: Fourth Down API
info.description:
The Fourth Down API is an HTTP REST-based API serving NFL data. This can be used to get schedule data and different types of game play by play data. The API is designed to be language/tool agnostic.

Most endpoints can be interacted with the same set of query parameters: `GameId`, `Season`, `Team` and `Week`.

post.summary: Create an API Key ith an expiry datetime

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name/alias for the created API Key

schema.description: Name/alias for the created API Key

get.summary:
Play by Play data for a set of games
Either GameId or a combination of Season, Week and Team should be provided

parameters.name: GameId
parameters.description: Specific gameId in format Season_Week_VisitorAbr_HomeTAbr

schema.description: Specific gameId in format Season_Week_VisitorAbr_HomeTAbr

parameters.name: Week
parameters.description:
Game week;
- REG (1-17)
- Wild Card (18)
- Divisional (19)
- Conference (20)
- Super Bowl (21)

schema.description:
Game week;
- REG (1-17)
- Wild Card (18)
- Divisional (19)
- Conference (20)
- Super Bowl (21)

parameters.name: Season
parameters.description: Seasons between 1999 and current season

schema.description: Seasons between 1999 and current season

parameters.name: Team
parameters.description: Team abbreviation. See /api/teams for abr attribute

schema.description: Team abbreviation. See /api/teams for abr attribute

get.summary:
Query for a set of games and accompanying details
If no parameters are passed, all team games for the current week for this season are returned

parameters.name: Week
parameters.description:

- REG (1-17)
- Wild Card (18)

- Conference (20)
- Super Bowl (21)
